title: Varinder Bhatia, Joint Vice President- Sales (Solar) at Havells India Ltd. - Energetica India
summary: Havells, an Indian company, is investing in solar energy products and solutions. They offer both off-grid and on-grid systems and have partnered with SBI to provide funding support for MSME customers who want to adopt solar. Havells is committed to offering quality products and has invested heavily in research and development.
